text: [Ej musulmonon, dar holi ehrom] Sajdi darjoi va xuroki on ʙaroi sumo halol sudaast, to sumo [ki dar Makka muqim hasted] va korvonijon [ki musofirand, hamagi] az on ʙarxurdor saved, va [-le] to zamone ki muhrim hasted, sajdi sahroi ʙar sumo harom ast va az Alloh taolo, ki [ruzi qijomat] nazdi U cam' mesaved, parvo kuned
